model

Class WeatherStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.WeatherStation

  • public class WeatherStation
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all information on a specific weather station, its name and all day to day entries.
    See Also:
    WeatherStationDailyEntry

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String bomLink
      The link to this stations weather observations on the bom website.
      boolean isFavorite
      True if this station has been selected as a favorite by the user.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the station.
      (package private) java.util.HashMap<java.util.Date,WeatherStationSnapshotEntry> snapshotEntries

      • WeatherStation

                      java.lang.String bomLink)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the station
        bomLink - The link to this stations observations on the bom site.

      • WeatherStation

        public WeatherStation(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String bomLink,
                      java.util.HashMap<java.util.Date,WeatherStationDailyEntry> entries)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this station ie. "Laverton, Victoria"
        bomLink - A link to the stations bom online data
        entries - A map of entries to their dates.

    • Method Detail

      • addSnapshotEntry

        public boolean addSnapshotEntry(java.util.Date date,
                                WeatherStationSnapshotEntry snapshotEntry)
        Snapshot entries can be added to a station provided the station doesn't already have an entry for the provided date.
        Parameters:
        date - The date associated to the entry
        snapshotEntry - The entry to add into this stations list.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the entry was added, false otherwise.

      • getSnapshots

        public java.util.Map<java.util.Date,WeatherStationSnapshotEntry> getSnapshots()
        Gets entries for station.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable map of entries for this station.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of the station

      • getBomLink

        public java.lang.String getBomLink()
        Returns:
        The bom link to the station's online data.

      • scrapeEntries

        public void scrapeEntries()
        Scrapes weather snapshots from the bomlink and stores them internally.
